sentences.en: Communication scholars cannot insulate kaleidoscopic real world , hence the Communication and China - Fudan Forum comes into being.
sentences.cn: 传播与中国,内关家事国事,外连五洲风云.新闻传播学者,自不能置之度外, 于是便有了“传播与中国·复旦论坛”.

sentences.en: Dance, depicting the kaleidoscopic and manifoldand exploring board field, is an art that manifests and beauty.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈描写大千世界,人间万态,开拓出广阔的领域, 是体现真善美的艺术.

sentences.en: Its serial, kaleidoscopic exposures force us to follow its lead.
sentences.cn: 它那系列的 、 多变的画面迫使我们跟着它转.
伦敦是个天花筒般的世界.

sentences.en: She closed her eyes again, kaleidoscopic colours whirling behind her eyelids.
sentences.cn: 她再次闭上了眼睛, 在她眼睑之后千变万化的颜色在旋转.

sentences.en: The kaleidoscopic quality of the book is brilliantly realised on stage.
sentences.cn: 该书包罗万象、精彩纷呈的特质在舞台上得到了精彩再现。

sentences.en: The transfer of administrative personnel in that colony was so frequent as to create kaleidoscopic effect.
sentences.cn: 在那个殖民地,官员调动频繁,就象走马灯似的.

sentences.en: Thoughts appear as kaleidoscopic patterns of light and sound.
sentences.cn: 思想显现为光和声的万花筒般的图案.

words.tran_cn: 千变万化的；万花筒似的

trans.tran_cn: 万花筒似的，千变万化的
trans.tran_en: kaleidoscopic scenes, colours, or patterns change often and quickly
